LanguageData.AEXP_Penguin.label: penguin
LanguageData.AEXP_Penguin.description: An aquatic, flightless bird, only found in arctic regions. Often seen in massive flocks, penguins are fierce when cornered, and can quickly overrun any hunter incompetent enough to get close to them.
LanguageData.AEXP_Penguin_Leather.label: penguin leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Penguin_Corpse.label: penguin corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Seal.label: seal
LanguageData.AEXP_Seal.description: A medium sized semi-aquatic mammal, which only comes ashore to eat, mate and escape from predators. Being an aggresive hunter, seals are capable of tackling much bigger prey and are known for cannibalism if the food is scarce.
LanguageData.AEXP_Seal_Leather.label: seal leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Seal_Meat.label: pinniped meat
LanguageData.AEXP_Seal_Corpse.label: seal corpse
LanguageData.AEXP_Walrus.label: walrus
LanguageData.AEXP_Walrus.description: A large marine animal only found in the arctic regions of the planet, a walrus has prominent tusks which are a valuable luxury good across the planet.
LanguageData.AEXP_Walrus_Leather.label: walrus leather
LanguageData.AEXP_Walrus_Corpse.label: walrus corpse
